title: DevCon Summit Shirt + Materials
paragraph: DevCon PH is the biggest developer conference in the Philippines, joined the team and collaborate for 2015 Shirt design and marketing assets.

cards.title: Theme: #OpenSourcePhilippines
cards.paragraph: The theme is simply close to me and caught my attention to join, since I came from the team behind Software Freedom Day!

cards.title: Challenge: Make the most of the exposures
cards.paragraph: DevCon is a non-government organization, It's sounds like a Foundation for developers by developers here in PH. DevCon got the biggest community in the Philippines, and meeting same-minded people and exposing my talents are the reason why I collaborate with them.

cards.title: The Shirt Design
cards.paragraph: My shirt was distributed for more than 2,000 developers and designers around the Philippines, and that makes me giggle.

cards.title: Marketing Team
cards.paragraph: One of my responsibility is collab-work on a bunch of assets and share ideas to marketing team. The creative team creates designs from concepts, merhandises, freebies to social media posts.
